newsitem.title: UK: NatWest's Gray to run Lombard and Ulster Bk.
newsitem.headline: NatWest's Gray to run Lombard and Ulster Bk.

text.p: National Westminster Bank Plc said on Thursday that Martin Gray will become executive director of its units Lombard Group and Ulster Bank with effect from March 1, 1997.
It said in a statement that Gray will maintain responsibilities as chief executive of NatWest UK.
